mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATMSG( MSG_NO, MSG, CREATE_DATE, SENDER_NO, RECEIVER_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_MSGNO.NEXTVAL, #{msgCo}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{senderNo}, #{receiverNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT CR.SENDER_NAME, CR.SENDER_NO, CR.RECEIVER_NO, CR.RECEIVER_NAME, CR.MEM_COUNT FROM CHATROOM CR JOIN MEMBER M ON (CR.SENDER_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE CR.SENDER_NO = #{senderNo} OR CR.RECEIVER_NO = #{senderNo}

SELECT MSG.MSG_NO, MSG.MSG, MSG.SENDER_NO, MSG.RECEIVER_NO, MSG.CREATE_DATE FROM CHATMSG MSG WHERE (MSG.SENDER_NO = #{senderNo} OR MSG.RECEIVER_NO = #{senderNo}) AND (MSG.SENDER_NO = #{receiverNo} OR MSG.RECEIVER_NO = #{receiverNo}) ORDER BY MSG_NO ASC

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MSG.MSG_NO, MSG.MSG, MSG.SENDER_NO, MSG.RECEIVER_NO, MSG.CREATE_DATE FROM CHATMSG MSG WHERE (MSG.SENDER_NO = #{senderNo} OR MSG.RECEIVER_NO = #{senderNo}) AND (MSG.SENDER_NO = #{receiverNo} OR MSG.RECEIVER_NO = #{receiverNo}) ORDER BY MSG_NO DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
